hero.description: Professional engineering, construction, and consultancy services. From project management to structural design, we deliver excellence in every project.

about.title: About SEBA Engineering
about.description: SEBA Engineering Construction & Consultancy is a leading provider of professional engineering, construction, and consultancy services. Under the leadership of Civil Engineer Selahattin BABADAĞ, we specialize in project management, structural design, site services, and heavy steel fabrication. Our team combines extensive experience with cutting-edge technology to deliver exceptional results for our clients. We work across various sectors including industrial, commercial, and infrastructure projects, ensuring the highest standards of quality, safety, and efficiency in every undertaking.

gallery.title: Project Gallery
gallery.description: Explore our portfolio of completed projects showcasing our expertise in engineering, construction, and consultancy services.
